title: OTOTO Red the Crab Silicone Utensil Rest - Kitchen Gifts, Silicone Spoon Rest for Stove Top - Heat-Resistant Kitchen and Grill Utensil Holder - Non-Slip Spoon Holder Stove Organizer, Steam Releaser
features: Meet Red, the Crab - From the Design Awarded OTOTO Studio, we bring you Red, the Crab, 'red'-y to lend a helping claw! This silicone spoon rest takes off the hassle while you do the hustle.
Claw-some' gift for anyone - Looking for new home gift ideas or funny housewarming gifts? No one can resist this quirky ladle and spoon holder rest! Seek no more for he's here from the ocean floor!
Kitchen 'Es-sea-ntial'- This spoon holder is something to 'shell-ebrate'! It's BPA-free and made of 100% food grade silicone, which means it's made to withstand rust and chipping.
Fun meets function - A pot of smouldering soup or boiling liquid ain't got nothing on this durable silicone utensil holder and steam releaser.

A Sprinkle of fun- Ever heard of the one where they lived happily ever after? Well, that's always the story with OTOTO's household products. Why? Because everyday chores are no longer a bore when you've got adorable gadgets to explore!
